title: Not being able to log back in after crashing from a game
body: I was playing league of legends with my friends and i was attempting to reconnect out of nowhere, i had to exit out of the game and the client said i could not connect even though my internet was perfectly fine. Then it exited me out of my client and now i cannot even log into my league account because it is taking a super long time to authenticating my login.I have no idea why this happen or why it is taking a long time to login, but i am sad that i will probably be reported for leaving afk even though it was out of my control

replies.body: This may have been due to ISP issues last night.  Let me know if you're still experiencing this, though.
seems it is alright right now

> [{quoted}](name=LucinaWoo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bmzE2xpZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-04T08:04:57.803+0000)
>
> My internet provider is Comcast

Seems it is affecting Comcast users
also when it is done authenticating it says unable to connect to the login queue
even the the website that the red text tells me to click to help doesn't load even though everything else loads perfectly fine
